languages.text: "Домин'{name}... распознал{mf||а} нашу суть. Для культа Кровавой паутины одно это — великая честь. Множество лет мы сплетаем нитями веры отсеки этого корабля. Мы храним величайшую реликвию — {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}Его Таро{/g}, посредством которого Он посылает нам свои благословенные откровения. Мы подчиняемся шепоту Неумирающего. В этом есть наше служение Ему. В этом есть наше служение тебе".

traits.locale_text: "Домин'{name}... распознал{mf||а} нашу суть. Для культа Кровавой паутины одно это — великая честь. Множество лет мы сплетаем нитями веры отсеки этого корабля. Мы храним величайшую реликвию — {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}Его Таро{/g}, посредством которого Он посылает нам свои благословенные откровения. Мы подчиняемся шепоту Неумирающего. В этом есть наше служение Ему. В этом есть наше служение тебе".

languages.text: "Domin'{name}... has discerned our essence. This is a great honour for the Bloodspun Web. We have woven the bays of this ship together with the threads of our faith for many years. We keep the greatest relic — {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}His Tarot{/g}, through which He sends us His blessed revelations. We obey the whispers of the Undying One. This is our service to Him. This is our service to you."
languages.original_text: "Домин'{name}... распознал{mf||а} нашу суть. Для культа Кровавой паутины одно это — великая честь. Множество лет мы сплетаем нитями веры отсеки этого корабля. Мы храним величайшую реликвию — {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}Его Таро{/g}, посредством которого Он посылает нам свои благословенные откровения. Мы подчиняемся шепоту Неумирающего. В этом есть наше служение Ему. В этом есть наше служение тебе".

traits.locale_text: "Enim'{name}... has discerned our essence. This is a great honour for the Bloodspun Web cult. For years, we have woven this ship's bays together with threads of faith. We have ushered those whose names the Undying One whispered. Therein lies our service to Him. Therein lies our service to you."

"Enim'{name}... has discerned our essence. This is a great honour for the Bloodspun Web cult. For years, we have woven this ship's bays together with threads of faith. We have ushered those whose names the Undying One whispered. Therein lies our service to Him. Therein lies our service to you."

"Enim'{name}... has discerned our essence. This is a great honour for the Bloodspun Web. We have woven the bays of this ship together with the threads of our faith for many years. We obey the whispers of the Undying One, and usher those He names to the other side. This is our service to Him. This is our service to you."

"Enim'{name}... has discerned our essence. This is a great honour for the Bloodspun Web. We have woven the bays of this ship together with the threads of our faith for many years. We obey the whispers of the Undying One, and usher those He names to the other side. This is our service to Him. This is our service to you."

"Domin'{name}... has discerned our essence. This is a great honour for the Bloodspun Web. We have woven the bays of this ship together with the threads of our faith for many years. We keep the greatest relic — {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}His Tarot{/g}, through which He sends us His blessed revelations. We obey the whispers of the Undying One. This is our service to Him. This is our service to you."

"Domin'{name}... has discerned our essence. This is a great honour for the Bloodspun Web. We have woven the bays of this ship together with the threads of our faith for many years. We keep the greatest relic — {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}His Tarot{/g}, through which He sends us His blessed revelations. We obey the whispers of the Undying One. This is our service to Him. This is our service to you."

languages.text: « Domin'{name}... a discerné notre essence. C'est un grand honneur pour la Toile de Sang. Voilà bien des années que nous tissons notre foi au sein de ce vaisseau. Nous veillons jalousement sur la plus noble des reliques, {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}Son tarot{/g} sacré, par l'intermédiaire duquel Il nous envoie Ses augustes révélations. Nous obéissons aux murmures de l'Immortel. Ainsi nous Le servons. Ainsi nous vous servons. »
languages.original_text: "Domin'{name}... has discerned our essence. This is a great honour for the Bloodspun Web. We have woven the bays of this ship together with the threads of our faith for many years. We keep the greatest relic — {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}His Tarot{/g}, through which He sends us His blessed revelations. We obey the whispers of the Undying One. This is our service to Him. This is our service to you."

traits.locale_text: « Domin'{name}... a discerné notre essence. C'est un grand honneur pour la Toile de Sang. Voilà bien des années que nous tissons notre foi au sein de ce vaisseau. Nous veillons jalousement sur la plus noble des reliques, {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}Son tarot{/g} sacré, par l'intermédiaire duquel Il nous envoie Ses augustes révélations. Nous obéissons aux murmures de l'Immortel. Ainsi nous Le servons. Ainsi nous vous servons. »

languages.text: «Domin'{name}... comprende nuestra esencia. Este es un gran honor para la Red Sanguinolenta. Hemos tejido la unión entre las bahías de esta nave con los hilos de nuestra fe durante muchos años. Custodiamos la mayor de las reliquias, {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}Su tarot{/g}, a través del cual nos envía Sus benditas revelaciones. Obedecemos a los susurros del Inmortal. Ese es nuestro servicio hacia Él. Ese es nuestro servicio hacia usted».
languages.original_text: "Domin'{name}... has discerned our essence. This is a great honour for the Bloodspun Web. We have woven the bays of this ship together with the threads of our faith for many years. We keep the greatest relic — {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}His Tarot{/g}, through which He sends us His blessed revelations. We obey the whispers of the Undying One. This is our service to Him. This is our service to you."

traits.locale_text: «Domin'{name}... comprende nuestra esencia. Este es un gran honor para la Red Sanguinolenta. Hemos tejido la unión entre las bahías de esta nave con los hilos de nuestra fe durante muchos años. Custodiamos la mayor de las reliquias, {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}Su tarot{/g}, a través del cual nos envía Sus benditas revelaciones. Obedecemos a los susurros del Inmortal. Ese es nuestro servicio hacia Él. Ese es nuestro servicio hacia usted».

languages.text: “秘者{name}……洞察了我们的本质，这是织血罗网莫大的荣耀。这么多年来，我们的教派通过信仰的丝线，将我们与你的旗舰编织在一起。我守护着最伟大的圣物——{g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}不死之神的塔罗牌{/g}。祂会通过祂的圣牌，向我们传达祂祝福的启示，而我们则会遵从祂的低语。这就是我们侍奉祂的方式，也是我们服务你的方式。”
languages.original_text: "Domin'{name}... has discerned our essence. This is a great honour for the Bloodspun Web. We have woven the bays of this ship together with the threads of our faith for many years. We keep the greatest relic — {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}His Tarot{/g}, through which He sends us His blessed revelations. We obey the whispers of the Undying One. This is our service to Him. This is our service to you."

traits.locale_text: “秘者{name}……洞察了我们的本质，这是织血罗网莫大的荣耀。这么多年来，我们的教派通过信仰的丝线，将我们与你的旗舰编织在一起。我守护着最伟大的圣物——{g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}不死之神的塔罗牌{/g}。祂会通过祂的圣牌，向我们传达祂祝福的启示，而我们则会遵从祂的低语。这就是我们侍奉祂的方式，也是我们服务你的方式。”

languages.text: 「ドミン・{name}は…我々の本質を見抜きました。これはブラッドスパン・ウェブにとって大きな名誉です。我々は長年、信仰の糸でこの船のベイを織り上げてきました。もっとも偉大な聖遺物、{g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}主のタロット{/g}を守り、それを通して主は祝福の啓示を送ってくださる。私たちは不死の者の囁きに従うのです。これが私たちの主への奉仕です。これがあなた方への奉仕です」
languages.original_text: "Domin'{name}... has discerned our essence. This is a great honour for the Bloodspun Web. We have woven the bays of this ship together with the threads of our faith for many years. We keep the greatest relic — {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}His Tarot{/g}, through which He sends us His blessed revelations. We obey the whispers of the Undying One. This is our service to Him. This is our service to you."

traits.locale_text: 「ドミン・{name}は…我々の本質を見抜きました。これはブラッドスパン・ウェブにとって大きな名誉です。我々は長年、信仰の糸でこの船のベイを織り上げてきました。もっとも偉大な聖遺物、{g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}主のタロット{/g}を守り、それを通して主は祝福の啓示を送ってくださる。私たちは不死の者の囁きに従うのです。これが私たちの主への奉仕です。これがあなた方への奉仕です」

languages.text: "Domin'{name} ... hat unsere Essenz erkannt. Das ist eine große Ehre für das Blutgesponnene Netz. Wir weben die Module dieses Schiffs seit vielen Jahren mit den Fäden unseres Glaubens zusammen. Wir hüten das größte Relikt – {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}Sein Tarot{/g}, über das Er uns Seine gesegneten Offenbarungen schickt. Wir gehorchen dem Flüstern des Todlosen. Das ist unser Dienst an Ihm. Unser Dienst an Euch."
languages.original_text: "Domin'{name}... has discerned our essence. This is a great honour for the Bloodspun Web. We have woven the bays of this ship together with the threads of our faith for many years. We keep the greatest relic — {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}His Tarot{/g}, through which He sends us His blessed revelations. We obey the whispers of the Undying One. This is our service to Him. This is our service to you."

traits.locale_text: "Domin'{name} ... hat unsere Essenz erkannt. Das ist eine große Ehre für das Blutgesponnene Netz. Wir hüten das größte Relikt – {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}Sein Tarot{/g}, über das Er uns Seine gesegneten Offenbarungen schickt. Wir gehorchen dem Flüstern des Todlosen. Das ist unser Dienst an Ihm. Unser Dienst an Euch."

languages.original_text: "Domin'... has discerned our essence. This is a great honour for the Bloodspun Web. We have woven the bays of this ship together with the threads of our faith for many years. We keep the greatest relic — His Tarot, through which He sends us His blessed revelations. We obey the whispers of the Undying One. This is our service to Him. This is our service to you."

languages.text: "Domin'{name}... Bizim kim olduğumuzu anlamış. Kanipi Ağı için büyük bir şeref. Nice yıllardır bu geminin bölmelerini inancımızın iplikleriyle örüp bir araya getirdik. Yadigârların en yücesine sahibiz... İmparator'un bize kutsal vahiylerini gönderdiği {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}Tarotu{/g} bizimdir. Ölmeyen'in fısıltılarına itaat ederiz. O'na hizmetimiz budur. Sana hizmetimiz budur."
languages.original_text: "Domin'{name}... has discerned our essence. This is a great honour for the Bloodspun Web. We have woven the bays of this ship together with the threads of our faith for many years. We keep the greatest relic — {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}His Tarot{/g}, through which He sends us His blessed revelations. We obey the whispers of the Undying One. This is our service to Him. This is our service to you."
